internalServerError: An internal server error occurred. Contact with your admin
connectionError: A connection error occurred. Contact with your admin
userDisabled: Your user is disabled. Contact with your admin

AUTH.passwordShouldBeChanged: Your password has expired, you should change it to be able to login again
AUTH.errorSaml: User not allowed. Contact with your admin
AUTH.expiredSession: Your session has expired. You have to login again.
AUTH.notAllowed: Sorry, you are not allowed to access the page you´re looking for
AUTH.pwdLength: The password must have at least {{minLength}} characters
AUTH.loginPwdError: The password can not be the same as the username
AUTH.alphaNumericError: The password must contain, at least, two letters and, at least, two numbers
AUTH.specialCharactersError: The password can not contain local characters, such as ñ or á
AUTH.previousValuesError: The password can not be the same as the previous one
AUTH.faceRecognitionError: There was an error trying to login with facial recognition
